review_text: I am using this as a whole house attic fan and it works just fine.  There is little noise and the hot air exhausted into the attic then escapes through the roof vents leaving both attic and house nice cooled.  From 106 degree daytime temperature, the fan will decrease the temperature to exactly the outside overnight temperature.
product_name: Lasko #2155A Electrically Reversible Window Fan, 16 Inches
